preqs: PAC2412 Integrated Therapeutics: Introduction and cardiovascularPAC3191 Microbiology and immunology

rules.ruleString: (Must have passed 2 (I/W) units in {PAC2412, PAC3191} OR  Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {PAC1001})
(Must be enrolled in course type {09, 09-1, 09-4, 10} and Must be enrolled in course version {2628, 2630, 3478, 3481, P3001})

description: The aim of this unit is to provide an introduction to disease state management and concepts common to a range of disease states and to provide an integrated foundation of basic knowledge of the chemistry, pharmacology and therapeutics required for the diagnosis and management of patients with infectious diseases. This unit also aims to develop students' generic skills in critical thinking, communication, problem-solving, leadership and working in teams.
faculty: Faculty of Pharmacy and Pharmaceutical Sciences
